tagline: Your personal Malaysian tax relief calculator
subtitle: Answer questions about your income and expenses. We'll calculate your tax, show reliefs you qualify for, find savings opportunities, and generate your Form BE guide.
formSubtitle: Below is a guide showing where to fill each field on Form BE (YA 2025). Highlighted fields are where your data goes.
disclaimer: ‚ö†Ô∏è Disclaimer: This is an educational tool and estimate only. Not tax advice. Refer to LHDN's official guidelines at hasil.gov.my or consult a licensed tax agent. Relief limits based on YA 2025.
formBENote: Use this as a reference when filling your e-Filing form on MyTax (mytax.hasil.gov.my). The highlighted rows show where your specific amounts should be entered.
emailPrompt: Want a November reminder to maximize year-end reliefs?
footer: CukaiKu ¬© 2025 ‚Ä¢ Educational tool only ‚Ä¢ Not tax advice
pcbNote: Monthly Tax Deduction (PCB): Check the pre-filled PCB amount matches your EA form. If you've overpaid through PCB, you'll receive a refund from LHDN within 30 working days of e-filing.
sectionANote: Fill in your name, IC number, TIN, address, marital status, employer number from your EA form.
